entities.name: professor grubbly-plank
entities.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank is introduced as the temporary Care of Magical Creatures teacher. She has closely cropped gray hair and a prominent chin.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid's absence is mentioned, with Professor Grubbly-Plank stating that he is indisposed.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is introduced as one of the students who is struggling through the snow to reach Professor Grubbly-Plank's front door.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is introduced as one of the students who is struggling through the snow to reach Professor Grubbly-Plank's front door. He asks where Hagrid is.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: Draco Malfoy and the rest of the Slytherins are introduced as they join the class, looking gleeful and unsurprised to see Professor Grubbly-Plank.

relationships.description: Professor Grubbly-Plank is the temporary Care of Magical Creatures teacher, implying that she teaches Hagrid's class.
